translations.Check also in 'Conditions' and update th: Check also in 'Conditions' and update them whenever necessary
translations.Check in 'Results' for HBV, HCV, HIV and: Check in 'Results' for HBV, HCV, HIV and Alpha-fetoprotein
translations.Comments on lab tests and investigations: Comments on lab tests and investigations
translations.Has a relative, friend, or health worker: Has a relative, friend, or health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
translations.Has the patient ever been a health care: Has the patient ever been a health care worker?
translations.Has the patient ever been a labour migra: Has the patient ever been a labour migrant?
translations.Has the patient ever been in prison?: Has the patient ever been in prison?
translations.Has the patient ever been on NSP Program: Has the patient ever been on NSP Programme
translations.Has the patient ever been on OST Program: Has the patient ever been on OST Programme
translations.Has the patient ever done a tattoo?: Has the patient ever done a tattoo?
translations.Has the patient ever used any drug /subs: Has the patient ever used any drug /substance
translations.Have you or someone else been injured be: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
translations.How many drinks containing alcohol do yo: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
translations.How often do you have a drink containing: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
translations.How often do you have six or more drinks: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
translations.How often during the last year have you: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because of drinking?
How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?
How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
translations.If yes, date of previous HBV treatment i: If yes, date of previous HBV treatment initiation
translations.Please check in 'Vital & Biometrics' for: Please check in 'Vital & Biometrics' for 'BP', 'Pulse' and 'Weight' and 'Height' AND add today's measurements
translations.Prescribe exams and medication with the: Prescribe exams and medication with the order basket
translations.Yes, but during the last year (4 points): Yes, but during the last year (4 points)
translations.Yes, but not in the last year (2 points): Yes, but not in the last year (2 points)
